mapper.select: select ing, cal, amount, F0, weight from (select ing, cal, amount, F0, weight from food where ing like '%' || #{ing} || '%' order by ing)
select ing, amount, cal, carb, prot, fat, F0, weight from food where ing = #{ing}
select ing, amount, cal, f0, weight from food where ing like '%' || #{ing} || '%' and ing not like #{ing}

select ing "ing", cal "cal", weight "weight", f0 "f0" from( select row_number() over(order by ing asc) as row_num, ing, cal, weight, f0 from food where ing like '%' || #{ing} || '%' )
WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
select count(*) from food where ing like '%' || #{ing} || '%'
